articles.title: Aamir Khan's daughter Ira pays tribute to assistant Amos: Never thought you wouldn't be around - India Today
articles.description: Aamir Khan's assistant Amos died of a heart attack on May 12. He worked with the superstar for more than 25 years.
articles.content:
On May 12, Aamir Khans assistant, Amos, breathed his last at Mumbai's Holy Family Hospital. He died of heart attack at 60. His death deeply saddened the PK actor as well as his wife, Kiran Rao. Amos had been working with Aamir for the past 25 years.

articles.description: Asha Bhosle released her first song on YouTube on May 13. The song, Main Hoon, is dedicated to spiritual leader Sri Sri Ravishankar and was released on the occasion of his birthday.
articles.content: Veteran singer Asha Bhosle made her YouTube debut recently and released her first song, Main Hoon, dedicated to spiritual guru Sri Sri Ravi Shankar. The song was released on the occasion of Sri Sris 64th birthday, on May 13. It is a soulful track that feature… [+2641 chars]
